title: game crash and get leave buster
body: ok so this is about my friend and me and when we go play at league sometime my friend  just crash hard but not a like a client crash because with a normal crash that is the client crash you just need to close your game and open it again and reconnect to the game but for him he need to full repair is game and yeah what append is the game is remake and yeah he get leave buster.i know that i might just get like a response like say to him to fix is computer or something like that but it's kind of injustice that he get leave buster when is game crash and it's not even is fault.so i tough that their should have some kind of thing that ask why you leave.thanks if someone read this.

replies.body: Same thing happened to me yesterday. makes me mad

While we can't do much about any leaverbuster penalties, since your friends team was still left without a 5th member to help, we can look into what caused his Bug Splat to begin with. 

Have him take a look through our [Bug Splat Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974) for some ways he could stop that from happening again, or have him reach out to us with more context as to what happened when the Bug Splat happened.
